title: Fires on all cylinders
review: Great movie. A must see for the big screen. The sound is phenomenal.

title: Best Spider-Man movie of all time!!
review: Arguably the best Spider-Man movie ever released, in any format. Yes, it's that good!

title: It's bad. Never gets better
review: Netflix movies are seriously crap. You'll find yourself annoyed by how boring it is. Just don't bother. Not interesting and doesn't make a point to keep your attention. Mediocre storytelling at best.
